definition: (old) third person singular pronoun ("he" or "she")/second person singular pronoun ("you")/(May 4th period) third person singular feminine pronoun ("she")/(Classical Chinese) introductory particle with no specific meaning/that (preceding a noun)
surname Yi/abbr. for 伊拉克[Yi1 la1 ke4], Iraq/abbr. for 伊朗[Yi1 lang3], Iran

sentences.chinese: “晚安”伊娃說，她搬起另一把椅子。

sentences.english: "What will you do?" Eva would ask him.
First draw out your EVE on a sheet of plain white cotton.
sentences.chinese: 首先，在一張平整的白色棉布上繪製出伊娃的外形。

sentences.english: Kin-folk come to see Yvonne by the dozen.
sentences.chinese: 親友們成羣結隊來看伊娃擠得水泄不通。

sentences.english: Inspired by a piece of pottery made by Eva.
sentences.chinese: 啓發由伊娃做的瓦器片斷。

sentences.english: The commission included actress Eva Longoria and other celebrities.
sentences.chinese: 該委員會包括女演員伊娃隆格里亞等名人。

sentences.english: Now Eva has another gig out in Gilford this morning so she's going to run off.
sentences.chinese: 伊娃待會還有另外一場演出，所以她要先離開了。

sentences.english: I did all this with six kids and three jobs (with tons of help from my wife Eva of course).
sentences.chinese: 當然，這離不開我妻子伊娃的大力協助。

sentences.english: Did you Eva see such a sweaty-looking superstar?
sentences.chinese: 你伊娃看到這樣一個滿身是汗的前瞻性巨星了嗎？

sentences.english: And of course, my wife Eva helped every step of the way.
sentences.chinese: 當然，我妻子伊娃在這一路上一直幫助着我。

sentences.english: He caught Evas eye and beckoned.
sentences.chinese: 他捕捉到伊娃的眼神，並向她示意。

sentences.english: Reeva is a vampire who specializes in feeding from young men.
sentences.chinese: 瑞伊娃是個專找年輕男子下手的吸血鬼。

sentences.english: Eva's busy drafting her speech for the conference.
sentences.chinese: 伊娃正忙着起草她的大會發言。

sentences.english: Eva thumbed her nose at her mother's command to stay home.
sentences.chinese: 伊娃不聽從母親讓她呆在家裏的命令。

definition: Hailun county level city in Suihua 綏化|绥化, Heilongjiang/Helen or Hélène (name)
Michel or Mitchell (name)/George Mitchell (1933-), US Democratic party politician and diplomat, influential in brokering Northern Ireland peace deal in 1990s, US Middle East special envoy from 2009
